author: Benny McKew
description: MIST or rinse chilled glass with orange blossom water and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into orange blossom rinsed glass filled with fresh ice.
name: South by Southwest

recipeInstructions.text: MIST or rinse chilled glass with orange blossom water and set aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into orange blossom rinsed glass filled with fresh ice
